recipe.title: Pear, Mushroom and Pomegranate Stuffing
ingredients: 1 demi whole-wheat baguette (about 8 oz), cut into 1-inch cubes
1 large Anjou or Bartlett pear, cored and cubed
instructions: Heat oven to 350°F. Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Cook mushrooms, celery, sage and thyme, stirring often, until mushrooms and celery soften, 6 to 8 minutes; season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a bowl; add baguette cubes, pear, prunes, broth and juice. Mix well and let rest until bread absorbs liquid. Transfer to an 8" x 8" baking dish; cover with foil. Bake 40 minutes, remove foil and bake until stuffing puffs up, about 5 minutes.
